combatMove.name: Tail-constrict
combatMove.description: Use [npc.her] strong, serpent-like tail to constrict [npc.her] target.
combatMove.availabilityDescription: Available to characters who have a '[#LEG_CONFIGURATION_TAIL_LONG.getName()]' leg configuration.
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionWithTarget: Use [npc.her] strong, serpent-like tail to constrict [npc2.name].
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionNoTarget: Use [npc.her] strong, serpent-like tail to constrict [npc.her] target.

performMove.execute:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(lurch)] forwards and [npc.verb(coil)] [npc.her] strong, serpent-like tail around [npc2.name]! #IF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_3)) [##npc2.setHealth(0)]
[style.italicsTerrible([npc2.NameIsFull] now totally constricted by [npc.namePos] tail, and as such [npc2.is] completely defeated!)] #ELSEIF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_2)) [##npc2.removeStatusEffectCombat(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_2)] [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_3, 10)]
[style.italicsTerrible([npc2.NameIsFull] almost totally constricted by [npc.namePos] tail, and as such [npc2.is] near to being completely defeated!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] tail-constricted again, [npc.she] will be instantly defeated!)] #ELSEIF(npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_1)) [##npc2.removeStatusEffectCombat(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_1)] [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_2, 10)]
[style.italicsBad([npc2.NameIsFull] seriously constricted by [npc.namePos] tail, and as such [npc2.is] struggling to fight back!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] tail-constricted again, this effect will become extremely serious!)] #ELSE [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_TAIL_RESTRAIN_1, 10)]
[style.italicsBad([npc2.NameIsFull] partially constricted by [npc.namePos] tail, and as such [npc2.her] ability to fight back is impaired!)]
[style.italicsTerrible(If [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(get)] tail-constricted again, this effect will become more serious!)] #ENDIF
